mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SubCategory (sub_category_name, sub_category_banner, sub_category_title, sub_category_desc, sub_category_icon, sub_category_tag, category_id) VALUES (#{subCategoryName}, #{subCategoryBanner}, #{subCategoryTitle}, #{subCategoryDesc}, #{subCategoryIcon}, #{subCategoryTag}, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: UPDATE SubCategory SET sub_category_name = #{subCategoryName}, sub_category_banner = #{subCategoryBanner}, sub_category_title = #{subCategoryTitle}, sub_category_desc = #{subCategoryDesc}, sub_category_icon = #{subCategoryIcon}, sub_category_tag = #{subCategoryTag}, category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE sub_category_id = #{subCategoryId}
